item.description:
Let's have a Singles Dinner Party!

 

Singles Dinner Parties are starting up again! 

 

I'd like to invite you to my home in Lexington on Sunday, October 9th from 6:30-9:30 pm. The dinner parties will be different from the ones Richard hosted.  I am sure you will enjoy them just as much and meet some wonderfully interesting folks along the way.

 

How will these Singles Dinner Parties be different?  

 

  • They will be small gatherings of 10-20 people (as gender balanced as possible) 
  • Some will have a theme - an opportunity to discuss, share, and have fun with
  • They will be a combination of catered and pot luck (more on that later)
  • They will be buffet style with comfortable places to sit and have conversation
  • If needed/desired, I will lead ice-breakers for fun and connection 
  • No alcohol will be served; please bring one bottle of wine if you'd like to drink and share some

 

DETAILS

 

Please join me and other Singles Dinner Party Meetup guests for dinner next Sunday evening.  

 

This evening's theme will be TRAVEL.  Please bring a few photos of the single most interesting place you've traveled in the world!  Come prepared to share a story or two.  

 

I will provide a chicken main dish along with a vegetarian option (please let me know if you are vegetarian ahead of time).  Please bring EITHER a side-dish or a dessert with you to share with 4 or 5 others.  

 

We need a minimum of 8 Singles to make this Dinner Party happen!  So please check your calendar now and RSVP asap if you'd like to join us!  

 

I look forward to meeting you and so does everybody else!  

 

Feel free to email or call me with questions -- 508-380-9254
item.name: Columbus Day Weekend Singles Dinner Party
